name: The Dreamscape (Out There Games)
description:
WARNING: THE STARTING AND ENDING CUTSCENES DON'T WORK IN THE BROWSER VERSION!

A game made in 3 days for the Mini Jam 105.

Yeah... I got a little over ambitious.  I tried to do so many things I had never done before like random generation, enemy's and top down shooting.
I think the end product turned out pretty fun! Buuuuuut... This game is bug-ridden!!! Most of these come from random generation, and despite hours of reasearch I couldn't seem to fix a lot of them...

A moment of silence for all of those who got to the final boss and instantly died because it spawned inside of them 😔
